title: Probleme with PING in NA
body: Hello guys..  iwas a player on EUNE and i bought Travel item in shop for 2600rp i wanted go to NA cuz my friend is there but probleem is i have 150ms ingame but i dont have bad internet in EUNE i had 26ms how i can fix this ? THX for answers :)

replies.body: Well, if you live in EUNE, it's harder to connect to the NA servers. I live in NA, made an account on EUW to play with friends & well.. 112 ping. Though it's playable.

It's pretty sucky to have tried to transfer to play with a friend, only to realize that you may not be able to get a strong enough signal since the server is physically so far away. Most likely the geographical distance between you and the NA servers is the main source of that higher ping, but we can still check out some of your [**network settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to see if you can make any adjustments to get a smoother connection.
